affect ( "npc_01", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	wait ( 2000.000 );
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
}

{
	wait ( 1500.000 );
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
}

{
	wait ( 1000.000 );
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
